data.message: What is with all the constant ads all of a sudden? Almost every 3rd post is an ad! It's ridiculous! I've already changed every setting I could and I keep hitting the "hide post" on them all. A few ads, ok, but this many?  Makes me actually want to look into other social media avenues.

replies.message: Hi Joyce. We're sorry to hear you aren't enjoying your experience on Facebook. Ads help keep Facebook free and we strive to only show ads that are relevant and interesting to you. Please let us know if you have any feedback at: http://bit.ly/2eyv1LM. -Hannah
